scripts.build: node -e "console.log('build: static node app, no compile step')"
scripts.llm:connect-env: sh -c 'if [ -z "$OPENAI_API_KEY" ]; then echo "OPENAI_API_KEY is empty"; exit 1; fi; curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:8787/api/system/llm/runtime -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"apiKey\":\"$OPENAI_API_KEY\"}" && echo && curl -s http://127.0.0.1:8787/api/system/llm-status'
scripts.llm:probe: curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:8787/api/chat/reply -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"message":"Find halal dinner in Shanghai for 2 under 200","language":"EN","city":"Shanghai","constraints":{"budget":"mid","dietary":"halal"}}'
scripts.llm:probe:source: curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:8787/api/chat/reply -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"message":"Find halal dinner in Shanghai for 2 under 200","language":"EN","city":"Shanghai","constraints":{"budget":"mid","dietary":"halal"}}' | grep -o '"source":"[^"]*"'
scripts.llm:diagnose: curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:8787/api/chat/reply -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"message":"Find halal dinner in Shanghai for 2 under 200","language":"EN","city":"Shanghai","constraints":{"budget":"mid","dietary":"halal"}}' | grep -o '"source":"[^"]*"\|"fallbackReason":"[^"]*"\|"reason":"[^"]*"\|"keySource":"[^"]*"\|"looksValid":\(true\|false\)'
